GSD.description:
net: ethernet: dec: tulip: de4x5: fix possible array overflows in type3_infoblock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.84 by commit 2c15d2a6ba2709dd8e209e597d1ff2a1a1996936. For more details please see the references link.
